sector-trading-stocks.Note: Trading Stocks include inventories held for trading purposes, real estates and repossessed items. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-trading-stocks.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-total-liabilities.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-total-liabilities.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-total-deposits.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-total-deposits.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-total-borrowings.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-total-borrowings.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-total-provisions-and-interest-in-.Note: Total Loan Loss provisions, interest in suspense and provision for decline in value of investment securities. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-total-provisions-and-interest-in-.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

sector-total-regulatory-capital-base.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
sector-total-regulatory-capital-base.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

capital-funds-to-deposits.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
capital-funds-to-deposits.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
capital-funds-to-deposits.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

borrowings-to-equity.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
borrowings-to-equity.Note: Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
borrowings-to-equity.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

core-capital-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
core-capital-ratio.Note: The ratio of Core Capital (Tier 1) to Risk Weighted Assets. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
core-capital-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

total-capital-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
total-capital-ratio.Note: The ratio of Total Regulated Capital to Risk Weighted Assets.Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding years month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
total-capital-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

gross-non-performing-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
gross-non-performing-ratio.Note: Ratio of gross non-performing advances to total advances.Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
gross-non-performing-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

net-non-performing-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
net-non-performing-ratio.Note: Ratio of non-performing loans net of interest in suspense and loan loss provisions to total loans and advances. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
net-non-performing-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

provision-coverage-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
provision-coverage-ratio.Note: The ratio of total loan loss provisions to non-performing advances. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
provision-coverage-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

return-on-assets-(annualized).Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
return-on-assets-(annualized).Note: Profit before tax (annualized) as a percentage of average assets.Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
return-on-assets-(annualized).Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

return-on-equity-(annualized).Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
return-on-equity-(annualized).Note: Profit before tax (annualized) as a percentage of average equity. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
return-on-equity-(annualized).Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

net-interest-margin-(nim).Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
net-interest-margin-(nim).Note: The ratio of interest income less interest expenses (annualized) to average assets. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
net-interest-margin-(nim).Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

efficiency-ratio.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
efficiency-ratio.Note: The ratio of non-interest expenses to total income less interest expenses, loan loss provisions and loans written off and this Ratio is restated from Dec 13 to consider the impact of the loan loss provision and loans written off. Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
efficiency-ratio.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

liquid-assets-to-total-assets.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
liquid-assets-to-total-assets.Note: Liquid Assets=Regulatory liquid assets, Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
liquid-assets-to-total-assets.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date

liquid-assets-to-deposits-&-borrowings.Source: Calculated using information received via web based returns
liquid-assets-to-deposits-&-borrowings.Note: Liquid Assets=Regulatory liquid assets, Financial year for the Licensed Finance Companies and Specialised Leasing Companies Sector is 12 months from month of April to corresponding year's month of March. Accordingly, quarterly information are presented as follows;
liquid-assets-to-deposits-&-borrowings.Update frequency: Within 6 weeks from the reporting date
